query: dialog with R's persona: persona: i have visited spain a times. i think i'll retire in a few years. i really like to travel. i'm a librarian. i'm 60years old. context:  R: yes ! barnaby is my german shepherd and my dad races cars . Q: cool ! wonder woman and i both love the color grey . you like scorpions ? R: me , barnaby and my dad travelled to spain for a nascar event . R: <extra_id_0>
answers: i did not know they had nascar in spain .
generation: i love visiting spain. i've been there many times.

passages.title: Tyler goes to war
passages.text: I am a young man. I want to serve my country. I joins the army. While in the army I go to war. I lose my life in a war.

passages.title: Tune Up
passages.text: I and Liz were going to drive my car to Las Vegas. But I wanted to make sure the car would make it. My brother thought I should get a tune up. I took it to the local car place to have it done. I was very happy my brother had made the suggestion.

passages.title: New Paint
passages.text: Today I decided to paint my laundry room. It was very hard to move both appliances. I had to call my friend to help me move the washer. He helped me clear the room and helped me paint. I was glad I called my friend for help.

passages.title: Foolish Frank
passages.text: I had been drinking beer. I got a call from my girlfriend, asking where I was. I suddenly realized I had a date that night. Since I was already a bit drunk, I could not drive. I spent the rest of the night drinking more beers.

passages.title: Chat
passages.text: It was the night after the first day of junior high. I and my friend Beth were on the phone. They had a lot to catch up on. I listened patiently as Beth told me about my day. She wanted to go 2 nd because she knew hers was the best day.

passages.title: Overweight Kid
passages.text: My parents were overweight. I was overweight as well. The doctors told my parents it was unhealthy. My parents understood and decided to make a change. They got themselves and I on a diet.
